desc: A peculiar ornament shaped like a cold, steely eye. Inlaid with fine metal and a small jewel.

dictionary.lore:
A peculiar ornament shaped like a cold, steely eye. Inlaid with fine metal and a small jewel.

Crafted with great care by a high priest or priestess, these ornaments are bestowed upon those who have walked faithfully by the side of Truth and worked all their life to uphold Justice. They are traditionally worn upon the forehead, symbolizing the third divine eye.

name: Oculus of Truth
